title: Mahindra Finance appoints Mahesh Rajaraman as CRO
description: Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services appoints Mahesh Rajaraman as Chief Risk Officer, replacing Mallika Mittal who resigned amid a fraud case involving Rs 135.9 crore. Rajaraman, with 29 years of banking experience, will lead the risk management function for a 5-year term.
